text: Ezɨ me, nguazim ko ain aning veregha marvir guar kamɨn dagarimɨn ingari. Ezɨ bizir kamɨn mɨngarim kamakɨn. Atrivim gumazamizir bɨaghireziba, ua me akuvasa nɨghnɨsi. Eghtɨ me atrivir igharazibar guivibar ikɨ, egh me deragh uari ko poroghan kogham.2:43 Aramɨn akam deragha akar otevir kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨra ain deragha nguazim ko pozir puvatɨ.
